name: Humble Administrator's Garden
address: No. 178 Northeast Road, Gusu District, Suzhou City
features: a UNESCO World Heritage Site and one of China's Four Famous Gardens.

name: Suzhou Museum
address: No. 204, Dong Bei Street, Gusu District, Suzhou
features: The new and exquisitely elegant museum building designed by Ieoh Ming Pei is worth visiting.

name: Zhouzhuang Town
address: No. 43, Quanfu Road, Zhouzhuang Town, Kunshan City, Suzhou City
features: It's famous for its many small bridges and winding waterways, the Twin Bridges, and the traditional Chinese riverboats. You can also walk in the footsteps of Shen Wansan.

name: Huqiu Scenic Area
address: No. 8, Shanmennei, Huqiu District, Suzhou City
features: You can enjoy the beautiful scenery of mountains and Jiangnan gardens, learn more about the Spring and Autumn Period and visit the leaning Huqiu Pagoda.

name: Lion Forest Garden
address: No. 23 Yuanlin Road, Gusu District, Suzhou City
features: one of Suzhou's Four Famous Gardens, best known for its rock garden. When you're there you can count the stone lions and walk through the rock maze. There are loads of things to do.

name: Hanshan Temple
address: No. 24, Hanshan Temple Lane, Gusu District, Suzhou City
features: A thousand-year-old temple, the source of the verse Hanshan Temple outside Gusu City, come here to ring the bell and pray for blessings.

name: Lingering Garden
address: No. 338, Liuyuan Road, Changmenwai, Gusu District, Suzhou City
features: Xiaojiabiyu-style Suzhou garden, the three treasures in the ornamental garden: Guanyun Peak, Nanmu Temple and Fish Fossil.

name: Tongli Ancient Town
address: Tongli Ancient Town, Wujiang District, Suzhou City
features: a Jiangnan water town surrounded by five lakes. You can walk across the Three Bridges and visit the exquisite Retreat & Reflection Garden

name: Shantang Street
address: the northwest corner of Gusu Old Town, Gusu District, Suzhou City
features: You can enjoy the scenery of old Suzhou, visit the old guild hall and other historical sites, take a cruise on the river and take photos of the beautiful night scenery.

name: Tianping Mountain Scenic Area
address: Lingtian Road, Wuzhong District, Suzhou City
features: It's the burial place of the ancestors of Fan Zhongyan and it's great fun climbing on the rocky roads in the area. Besides, in mid-to-late November, you can view the beautiful enjoy red maple trees there.

name: Pingjiang Road
address: No. 65, Baita East Road, Gusu District, Suzhou City, Jiangsu Province
features: Stroll through the well-preserved ancient blocks, see the ancient houses with small bridges and flowing waters, visit literary shops, and eat delicious food.

name: Jinji Lake Scenic Area
address: No. 158, Xinggang Street, Industrial Park, Suzhou
features: get a good view of tall buildings like the Gate of the Orient, ride the Ferris wheel, take a night cruise, and feel the modern side of Suzhou.

name: Guanqian Street
address: Guanqian Street, Gusu District, Suzhou City.
features: You can try food from time-honored Suzhou brands, such as Songhelou Restaurant, Huang Tianyuan, and visit Xuanmiao Temple, the place that gave the street its name.

name: Mudu Town
address: No. 188, Shantang Street, Mudu Town, Wuzhong District, Suzhou City
features: a water town featuring gardens. You can visit classical gardens such as Yanjia Garden, go on a boat ride and enjoy the flowing water.

name: Panmen Scenic Area
address: No. 49, East Street, Gusu District, Suzhou City, Jiangsu Province
features: Climb and take a boat tour to visit Panmen, the only water and land city gate in the country, walk through Wumen Bridge, and visit Ruiguang Pagoda.

name: Shajiabang Scenic Area
address: Shajiabang Town, Changshu City, Suzhou City.
features: the birthplace of the Peking Opera Shajiabang. Here, you can look at the settings from the opera and take a boat deep into the reeds.

name: Master of the Nets Garden
address: No. 11 Kuojiatou Alley, Daichengqiao Road, Gusu District, Suzhou
features: Knowing the small and exquisite garden, understand the mystery of the layout, and enjoy the performance of folk art during the night tour.

name: Xishan Island Scenic Area
address: No. 158, Linwu Road, Jinting Town, Wuzhong District, Suzhou
features: Xishan is the largest island in Taihu Lake, where you can see the misty lake scenery of Taihu Lake.

name: Qionglong Mountain Scenic Area
address: Qionglong Mountain Scenic Area, one km southwest of Zangshu Town, Wuzhong District, Suzhou City
features: climb the highest mountain in Suzhou, enjoy the fresh air of the forest and trace the footsteps of Sun Tzu and historical persons

name: Canglang Pavilion
address: No. 3, Canglang Pavilion Street, Renmin Road, Gusu District, Suzhou City
features: one of the oldest gardens in Suzhou. It's very quiet and the lattice windows on the walls of the two-way corridor are very beautiful.

name: Luzhi Ancient Town
address: No. 21, Xiaoshi Road, Luzhi Town, Wuzhong District, Suzhou City
features: Luzhi Ancient Town has a history of over 2,500 years. The crossing waterways and the many bridges have earned it the titles of the "Pearl of the Five Lakes" and the "Thoroughfare of the Six Ponds".

name: Qiandeng Town
address: No. 1, Shangshu Road, Qiandeng Town, Kunshan City, Suzhou City
features: Qiandeng Town has a history of more than 2500 years. You can enjoy its traditional buildings with white walls and black-tiled roofs and splendid scenery.

name: Lingyan Mountain Scenic Area
address: at the end of Shantang Street, Mudu Ancient Town, Wuzhong District, Suzhou City
features: It is a good place to climb the mountain. From the top of the mountain, you can overlook the city of Suzhou. You can pray to Buddha in Lingyan Mountain Temple.

name: Eslite Bookstore
address: 2-3F, No. 8, Yuelang Street, Industrial Park, Wuzhong District, Suzhou City
features: Eslite Bookstore is a comprehensive building integrating stationery, catering and entertainment.

name: Suzhou Taihu Lake Wetland Park
address: No. 1, Town Lake Embroidery Street, Suzhou New District, Suzhou City
features: The wetland park integrates tourism, entertainment, leisure, and education all in one. You could say it's a "paradise on earth".

name: Soochow University
address: No. 1, Shizi Street, Gusu District, Suzhou City
features: Soochow University is located in the old town of Suzhou and is part of the national "211 Project". Its predecessor was the original Soochow University founded in 1900.

name: Xi'an Jiaotong-Liverpool University
address: No. 111, Ren'ai Road, Dushu Lake Higher Education Town, Suzhou Industrial Park, Suzhou
features: It is a university jointly established by Xi'an Jiaotong University and the University of Liverpool.

name: Dongting Dongshan
address: Near Moli Road, Wuzhong District, Suzhou City.
features: Huanshan Road is like a jade belt, you can enjoy Taihu Lake and exquisite ancient buildings along the way, and taste the three whites of Taihu Lake.

name: Suzhou Center
address: 150 meters west of the intersection of Xingzhou Street and Xinggang Street, Suzhou Industrial Park
features: The largest shopping mall in Suzhou, by the Jinji Lake, is the Gate of the East.

name: Suzhou Amusement Land Forest Waterworld
address: the east of Yanghan East Road and the west of Shanshenwan Road, Suzhou New District, Suzhou City.
features: forest-themed. It is like being in a vast forest close to the ocean.

name: Huayi Brothers Movie World
address: No. 188, Yangchenghu Avenue, Industrial Park, Suzhou City
features: Based on the seven movies of the Huayi Brothers, the amusement park has invited famous movie artists to make groundbreaking designs to reproduce scenes from movies for visitors.

name: Suzhou Aquarium
address: No.28, Huan Taihu Avenue, Suzhou Taihu National Tourism Vacation Zone
features: enjoy a variety of marine creatures, watch wonderful animal performances, and experience the colorful ocean world

name: Jinxi Ancient Town
address: No. 18, Shaodiangang Road, Jinxi Town, Kunshan City, Suzhou City
features: Jinxi Ancient Town is in the southern suburbs of Kunshan by Dianshanhu Lake. It's a Jiangnan water town with a history of more than a thousand years.

name: Shilu Pedestrian Street
address: Shilu Pedestrian Street, Jinchang District, Suzhou City
features: The Stone Road was built during the Westernization Movement in the late Qing. The road is paved with stones, thereof the name "Stone Road". Here you'll find many famous stores with a long history.

name: Harmony Times Square
address: No. 268, Wangdun Road, Suzhou Industrial Park
features: Harmony Times Square is a large-scale, comprehensive, modern and high-quality commercial complex integrating shopping, catering, leisure, entertainment, business, culture, tourism and many other functions.

name: Impression City Shopping Center
address: No. 1699 Modern Avenue, Suzhou Industrial Park, Suzhou City, Jiangsu Province.
features: Impression City Shopping Center is a great place to shop, eat, or watch a movie. You can also various brands in the mall.

name: Stone Lake
address: No. 333, Youxin Road, Wuzhong District, Suzhou City.
features: It's famous for Stone Lake's wonderful scenery and the endless rows of mountains and ridges. It's a great place to appreciate the mountain and water culture of Suzhou.

name: the Gate of the Orient
address: No. 9, Suya Road, Suzhou Industrial Park, Suzhou City
features: Commonly known as Quku, the Gate of the East has become a new landmark for Internet celebrities in Suzhou. It is located at the east end of the CBD axis of Suzhou Industrial Park.

name: Dushu Lake Church
address: No. 99, Cuiwei Road, Suzhou City
features: Dushu Lake Church is located by the beautiful Dushu Lake in Suzhou Industrial Park and that's where the spot gets its name. Plus, the church was built in the Gothic architectural style.

name: Baimajian Ecological Park
address: Huashan Road, Fengqiao Sub-district, Suzhou New District, Suzhou City
features: It used to be the imperial road that Qianlong walked through when he went to the south of the Yangtze River six times, and there are also the ruins of the palace; it used to be the place where Goujian, King of Yue, raised horses for King Wu for nine years.
